content:
Friends! How is everyone? Is there a way to delete a certain group of users on the left side, in direct messages?

Example, of these:

image.png

@Flávio Zarur Lucarelli not exactly -- it's just a sorted list of conversations by recency. If you delete all the messages in a conversation, it'll disappear from there, but the main thing is that once you have more than ~10 conversations the older ones will be hidden behind a "short more" widget.
Thanks, Tim. Id like to be able to delete them ;) as they cluttered and I get confused.
@Flávio Zarur Lucarelli Would prioritizing certain conversations (or involving certain users) resolve that, eg. by floating those to the top, or above a thin line?
Hi, Neil. How are you? Thanks. Hmmm would help, but Id really like to be able to remove certain groups of users there. ;) close it... as its messy and I dont need them all.
